name: Low Erosivity Waiver (LEW)
description: The Low Erosivity Waiver (LEW) or the Rainfall Erosivity Factor Calculator for Small Construction Sites app is a responsive, map-centric, mobile ready web application that allows end-users (i.e. construction companies, NPDES permitting authorities) to determine if they can waive NPDES permitting requirements for stormwater discharges from small construction sites.
tags: Stormwater discharges from small construction sites
